subject: Hockey, Ice
Stanley Cup
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Boston advanced to the Stanley Cup finals for the second time in three seasons, sweeping Pittsburgh, whose stars Sidney Crosby and Evgeni Malkin did not have a point in the series.
snippet: Boston advanced to the Stanley Cup finals for the second time in three seasons, sweeping Pittsburgh, whose stars Sidney Crosby and Evgeni Malkin did not have a point in the series.
